title: Turnover of Italian fashion company Giorgio Armani 2011 to 2018
summary: The Turnover of the Italian luxury brand Giorgio Armani has increased twofold over the period surveyed , rising from roughly 1275 million euros in 2011 to 1702 million euros in the Year 2015 .
Despite the steady increase in Turnover during the period considered , the company reported a net loss of approximately 25 million euros in 2018 .
Worldwide recognition Founded in 1978 Milan , Giorgio Armani is one of the leading international fashion design houses .
